data.text:
Ben Kingsley is an English Actor, who has span 50 years with film & TV serials. He was born December 31, 1943, in Snainton, North Riding of Yorkshire, England. He won an Oscar, Grammy, BAFTA, two Golden Globes, and a Screen Actors Guild Award. Ben Kingsley has an estimated net worth of $60 million dollars. He is popularly known for his role as Mohandas Gandhi in the film Gandhi (1982).

Ben Kingsleyâs Height is 5 feet 8 inches or 173 cm, and His Weight is 74 Kg or 163 Pounds. His body measurement is 41-34-13 inches. His Shoe Size is 9 (US). His Body Build Type is Average Shape.

Ben Kingsley is the son of Rahimtulla Harji Bhanji, a Medical Doctor, and Anna Lyna Mary, an Actress & Model. He has a brother and two younger sisters. He went to Manchester Grammar School and then the University of Salford and Pendleton College. Ben Kingsley had married Angela Morant & divorced, then married Alison Sutcliffe & divorced, and then married Alexandra Christmann & divorced, and then married Daniela Lavender in 2007.
